title: ADD MORE EMOTE SLOT PLS
body:
I already had 43 emotes, but there is only 5 slot I can use in the game.
Add more emotes slot or make a new emote button.
Maybe remake the in-game emote interface, or just simple make current mote interface bigger and make it accommodate more emotes.
PLSSSSS
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: I think you are mistaken LoL with a social media platform... We really don't need that many during gameplay.
